page.title: 20SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: {FRENCHAY BRIDGE}- was built in 1774. It has had quite a lot of trouble. Signs and barriers have been erected and have been ignored.All the weight of the traffic has caused considerable damage to the bridge. In the end concrete bollards have been put up so no traffic can get through. This is of great concern to Frenchay Hospital as it is just around the corner and emergency vehicles cannot get through. Some people feel very strongly about change in their community.A sports complex,proposed for Stoke Gifford, was rejected after local people protested about possible noise and vandalism. { {HEALTH}- There are{no hospitals}in this area but a large one is at nearby Frenchay. There are{no doctors surgeries,}local people must travel to visit a doctor.
